library(dplyr)
library(xtable)
people <- read.csv(file="../coffee_database/people.csv",stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

people %>%
  select(Printed.Name,ID) %>%
  mutate(Amount="") %>%
  write.csv(file="PaymentDatasheet.csv",row.names=FALSE)
